item.title: Kristala
item.description:
Title: Kristala
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG , Early Access
Developer: Astral Clocktower Studios
Publisher: Astral Clocktower Studios
Release Date: Jun 6, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Jun 6, 2024




About This Game


Embark on an epic journey in Kristala, a Dark Fantasy Action RPG featuring challenging combat , acrobatic parkour , and exploration to uncover a detailed story. Become the role of a fledgling feral warrior who must master the all six magic specialties of the ancient sacred Kristals.

Kristala is pouncing into Early Access on Steam June 6, 2024 and will be released via individual Episodes. Your Day-1 purchase unlocks access to all 7 Episodes at a discounted, one-time price.

Each Episode includes 2 - 6 hours of gameplay, depending on your experience with the ARPG genre and overall interaction with side quests. Detailed content updates will be shared via Steam’s announcement system as new updates are pushed.




Punishing & Satisfying Combat


Avoid damage by blocking, dashing/rolling + deflecting attacks. Win battles by combining light + heavy attacks, utilizing multiple weapon abilities, and the casting of up to 16 equipped spells at a time. Regenerate Mana by engaging in melee combat — unlock + level catlike abilities on a Feline Skill tree.

Defeat Obstacles with Stealth & Nimbleness


Execute unique abilities that allow you to traverse the environment in many ways, overcoming new + exciting challenges. New traversal abilities are unlocked by progressing Kristala’s main storyline + each new skill opens up new pathways in previously explored areas.

Create Your Own Unique Feline Character


Choose from a variety of fur patterns and lengths, plus a clan choice that determines the type of magic you'll level throughout the game. Your starting class determines your starting weapon, armor, and stat loadouts. Develop your feline character as you go via the leveling of stats, magic, and feline abilities to fit your desired play style.

Piece Together the Lore through Exploration


In-game cinematics + an enchanting soundtrack are often used as storytelling tools, along with written journal pickups + impactful NPC interactions. Unravel the story even further via unique Kristal Memory items — brief scenes recounting past events that occurred where the Memories are found.





**Kristala will be be fully compatible with Steam Deck soon after our initial Early Access release.**



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11, 64bit
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400、AMD Ryzen™ 5 3400G
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 4GB、Radeon RX 570 4GB
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 25 GB available space
    • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
    • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
    Recommended:
    • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11, 64bit
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-8700、AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600XT
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 6GB、Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 25 GB available space
    • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
    • Additional Notes: SSD, 1080P, 60FPS

item.title: Ultimate General: American Revolution
item.description:
Title: Ultimate General: American Revolution
Genre: Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Game-Labs
Publisher: Game-Labs
Franchise: Game-Labs
Release Date: Jun 6, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Jun 6, 2024




About This Game

Take on the role of the American Colonists, and fight for territorial control over North America. A gripping real-time campaign awaits you on a detailed 3d map where you can build your army and navy, construct military infrastructure, and fully command your armies on a regimental level. If you want even more action you can fully zoom-in and fight massive battles on a battalion level.

Fight in real-time on the global map with regiments and naval squadrons. Move your General to gain tactical control of the situation in a minimal way. The presence of the General makes it possible to control the troops or ships directly on the map, actively use maneuvers, cut supply routes, utilize different types of terrain, and flank with cavalry. The battles can be fought with more detail and full tactical control by zooming-in further on the map.

MASSIVE BATTLES


If you choose to fight battles with full tactical control, the regiments become divided into smaller battalions allowing you the command of hundreds of units in real-time, creating a dazzling and realistic combat experience of the historical period. Troops are positioned in a landscape according to the placement they had on the map at the given time. Some will engage the enemy immediately, others can be re-positioned in deployment zones, while those which were further away may join later as reinforcements.

DELAYED REPORTING


Realistic reconnaissance is simulated, making messages the basis of military intelligence and battle maneuvering. Messages can be delayed or be intercepted by the enemy, resulting in your orders not reaching your troops in time or rendering communication with your distant territories impossible.

BUILD YOUR ARMY AND FLEET


You will need a strong army and navy to win the war. Form infantry regiments, cavalry squadrons, and fleets. Assign the best officers and equip units with the strongest weapons to increase their power. You will have to choose how best to manage your recruits - create new units or replenish casualties? Such decisions may have a huge impact on the course of war.

MILITARY INFRASTRUCTURE


Lead your troops to victory. Develop regions that provide food, weapons, and ammunition for your army and navy. Build military structures to train special recruits or host your army during the harsh winter. Build infrastructure to raise supplies and plan supply routes that reach your armies while they are fighting.

SUPPLY YOUR TROOPS


Armies or Fleets cannot be maintained without an effective industrial base. Produce rifles, cannons, and build ships. A single shot needs powder and a bullet. War requires tons of powder and thousands of bullets. Organize and prioritize the production chain to fulfill your army's requirements.

DEVELOP YOUR HEADQUARTERS


Design the structure of the army in full detail, by creating and organizing army departments which are essential for a functional army. Manage their funds and allocate the right person for each department to directly influence the army’s efficiency in combat, intelligence and supply management. As the department’s officers gain experience they become more effective not only in their main role but also in researching new weapons, tactics and inventing methods that will progressively further enhance your army.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
    • Storage: 12 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX - compatible audio card
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-i7 or AMD equivalent
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD equivalent
    • Storage: 12 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX - compatible audio card

item.title: Nightmare Kart
item.description:
Title: Nightmare Kart
Genre: Racing , Free to Play
Developer: LWMedia
Publisher: LWMedia
Release Date: Jun 5, 2024




About This Game

You are a beast hunter, conscripted against your will to participate in a most peculiar local custom: a tournament where participants race atop mysterious vehicles comprised of copper and steam.

Race through blood-soaked gothic streets atop one of 12 unique vehicles as you seek answers behind the origin of this nightmare. Wield powerful weapons to reduce your opponents to scrap, slaughter beasts to raise your top speed, perform tricks and drifts to generate Æther to boost, and overcome challenging boss encounters to unlock the secrets behind this terrible dream.

Start your engines, the first race is about to begin.

*Controller required for local multiplayer!
*This is a free game, but if you want to donate, you can do so here! Ko-fi.com/lwmedia0554

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: 10
    • Graphics: 512
    • Storage: 300 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Saloon Simulator: Prologue
item.description:
Title: Saloon Simulator: Prologue
Genre: Adventure , Simulation
Developer: Glivi Games S.A.
Publisher: RockGame S.A.
Franchise: RockGame S.A.
Release Date: Jun 5, 2024




About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2616140/Sunset_Motel/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1876930/Saloon_Simulator/




America, 19th century after the Civil War. Sand dunes, hot sun, and galloping horses - feel it all while holding a portion of Tequila on ice in your hand. In Saloon Simulator Prologue, take on the challenge of rebuilding an old saloon in the heart of the Wild West and become a pioneer in the liquor business.

Prepare drinks, serve them to customers, and discover their stories




Not everything went your way; you were cheated, but don't worry! Your longed-for paradise is closer than ever - refresh the ruined interior and repair the damaged furnishings. Purchase the most necessary equipment, stock up on alcohol, and start designing the saloon to your liking. Just remember, money is not manna from heaven - ill-considered purchases are not necessarily advisable here!

Prepare dishes, feed your guests, and observe their reactions




In Saloon Simulator Prologue, you are the owner of a ruined Saloon. Make the wooden walls once again become a place of bustling meetings with a lot of alcohol. Attract customers and fulfill their expectations with the utmost care, while learning about drink recipes or various types of alcohol inspired by 19th-century America. But that's not all, your task will also be to provide an atmospheric decor, and thus maintain order.

Enhance your saloon by choosing from over 50 decoration models.




Earn reputation points and attract more and more customers. Make your new guests want to come back again and again with generous tips. Create the most recognizable business in the Wild West.

Build relationships with 8 unique NPCs and become a part of their lives.




Serving drinks or preparing food is a hard and time-consuming job, but it becomes impossible without prior preparation of the logistical background. Plan your orders in advance and keep your saloon stocked. Increase your business capital through negotiations.

Maintain your saloon for customer comfort




Expand your Saloon - unlock new equipment or rooms. Establish new relationships with characters and reap the benefits of them, all to help your business thrive.

Dive into the mechanics of the criminal world




The 19th-century West beyond the sand dunes and hot sun offers history-soaked grounds and a variety of activities. As the day begins to head west, while holding a glass of cold Tequila, take a look at what the area outside the Saloon has to offer, as well as its residents, whose favor will make your life easier more than once or twice.

Saloon Simulator Prologue, includes:


-16 Quests: Engage in a variety of tasks that introduce you to saloon management.
-12 Drinks and Recipes: Mix and serve a selection of 10 drinks and 2 special recipes.
-8 NPCs: Interact with unique characters, each with their own stories and challenges.
-Bartending Mechanics: Master drink preparation and cooking.
-Criminal World Mechanics: Experience thrilling activities like dismantling carts and hiding bodies.
-Full Customization: Customize every aspect of your saloon from the floor to the chandelier.
-Premises Management: Unload goods, clean up, and maintain a pristine environment.
-Bar Fights: Handle conflicts and keep the peace in your saloon.
-3 Merchants: Trade with various suppliers for essential goods and decorations.
-Over 50 Customizable Objects: Personalize your saloon with a wide range of items.
-Dealing with Death: Navigate the darker aspects of saloon management, including handling dead bodies.

Get ready to dive into the life of a saloon owner and create the most recognizable business in the Wild West with Saloon Simulator Prologue.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: Intel Core i3 10100f / Ryzen 3400G
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 4GB / AMD Radeon RX 460 4GB
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400f / Ryzen 3600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB

item.title: Diabotical Rogue
item.description:
Title: Diabotical Rogue
Genre: Action , Early Access
Developer: GD Studio Inc
Publisher: GD Studio Inc
Release Date: Jun 4, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Jun 4, 2024




About This Game


An online, PvP, first-person shooter that combines fast-paced combat and roguelike upgrades.

Hop into your suit and glide around the maps with buttery smooth movement. Every match is a wild ride where your upgrade choices can make or break you. It's like a fast-paced game of chess, but instead of kings and queens, you've got lasers and explosions.

KEY FEATURES

  • FPS with Roguelike upgrades
  • 3 suits, each with unique weapons, abilities, and upgrades
  • Roguelite progression tree for each suit
  • Early Access Release Game Modes: 4v4 Wipeout, 16v16 Warmup
  • Custom Map Editor

CHUNK - Can take a hit

Unique Weapons: Rocket Launcher, Blaster
Unique Abilities: Leap Slam, AOE Shield

EGGBOT - Heart of gold

Unique Weapons: Crossbow, Egun
Unique Abilities: Bolt, Personal Teleport

SCOUT - Catch me if you can

Unique Weapons: Sniper, Revolver
Unique Abilities: Hookshot, Heal Grenade




EARLY ACCESS RELEASE GAME MODES

4v4 Wipeout: Respawn timers increase with every death. Eliminate the entire opposite team to win the round.

16v16 Warmup: Large scale team based shootout. Try out characters and weapons and use opponents for target practice.


CUSTOM MAP EDITOR

Create your own maps using the in-game map editor, the same editor used by our dev team. Then play these community maps with your friends in custom lobbies.


OH YOU'RE STILL HERE

Here's a sneakpeek of the weebles hard at work. We also post more details of our development process on Discord. ;)

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: These are the bare minimum specs to run the game. Your FPS may still be affected depending on your hardware.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen™ 7 3700X
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
